Package dk.statsbiblioteket.util

Class Summary
Bytes Utillity class for working with bytes, bytearrays, and strings.
CachedCollator Uses char-statistics to build a cache for the specified locale.
Checksums  
DocumentUtils Utility methods for working with w3c DOM Documents.
Files General purpose methods to handle files $Id: Files.java,v 1.11 2007/12/04 13:22:01 mke Exp $
LineReader A Java NIO based high-performance, large file-size enabled, random seek capable line reader.
Logs Helper class for logging.
Profiler The State and University Library of Denmark.
Projects Deprecated.
Streams Utility methods for handling streams
Strings Convenience methods for string manipulations.
XProperties Human Readable Properties with XStream backend.
Zips Utility class to help zipping entire folders and store the zip file on disk.
 

Enum Summary
Files.Permission Enumeration of the standard file permission flags
Files.Type Enumeration of the two different types of file objects; directories and regular files.
Logs.Level Logging levels corresponding to Log.
 

Exception Summary
DigestException A RuntimeException thrown when there is unexpected errors computing a digest.
FileAlreadyExistsException This exception is thrown when a method would overwrite an existing file.
FilePermissionException An IOException thrown by operations requiring certain file permissions rights to work when the required permissions are not present.
InvalidFileTypeException An IOException thrown by operations expecting a regular file but finding a directory, or reverse, expecting a directory, but receiving a regular file.
InvalidPropertiesException Exception to signal errors in stored properties from XProperties
